quotes.quote: To demonstrate how difficult it had been to clean the mirrors, he asked he maintenance man to show the girls how much effort was required. The custodian obliged, took out a long-handled squeegee, dipped it in the toilet, and cleaned the mirror with it. SInce then, there have been no lip prints on the mirror.
